### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15717](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15717.html) (Changes to support NAT-PMP by MishraShivend

ACK.  I actually had misremembered how this works myself, thinking that `whitelistforcerelay` only applied to the relay treatment of invalid transactions, rather than ones that might already be in the mempool.\n\nPerhaps it would also be helpful to update the text for `-whitelistforcerelay`, to indicate that has to be set to true in order for transactions already in the mempool to be relayed as
Added details to `-whitelistforcerelay` about relaying already-in-mempool transactions, as suggested by @sdaftuar (thanks!).
